Software Engineering Competence Center (SECC)
of Information Technology Industry Development Agency (ITIDA)
cordially invites you to attend

“Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) Strategy
Road Mapping Event”, which will be held on

Thursday 26 June 2014, 9:30 A.M
ITIDA Premises, Building 121, Ground Floor Theatre,
Smart Village

The event targets and seeks the input of decision makers in the ICT industry, government and society to shape the initiatives and programs constituting the strategy implementation plan.

Kindly register here for free seat :http://www.secc.org.eg/Event_Registration.asp
Please Register before Tuesday 24 June, 2014.
Event Agenda: http://www.secc.org.eg/FOSS_Kick-Off_Agenda.pdf

For any assistance, Please Call SECC Team (+202)3534 5209/5208
Software Engineering Competence Center-SECC

#SECC #Egypt #ITIDA #ICT #OpenSource
